system.description: When you try to do something under pressure, or in a dangerous situation, roll with the most relevant stat.

failure.label: Miss (6-)
failure.value: You fail, and things get worse. The GM will tell you how.

partial.label: Weak Hit (7-9)
partial.value: You do it, but the GM will offer you a worse outcome, hard bargain, or ugly choice.

success.label: Strong Hit (10+)
success.value: You do what you set out to do.
